story_14_02000/2401_1001_0100_10:
You must be the sync pair I’ve been hearing
about—the one they say can’t be stopped!
story_14_02000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Ooh, and such a photogenic face, too!
Perfect for a picture! Let me go ahead
and take one right now.
story_14_02000/2401_0401_0400_10:
Nice! Even that confused look on your face is
fantastic! Just fantastic!
story_14_02000/2401_0402_0600_10:
What a cooperative subject you are!
And that expression is just fantastic!
story_14_02000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Viola! You shouldn’t take people’s photos
like that without asking their permission!
story_14_02000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Sorry about that, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Sometimes Viola gets excited and starts
snapping photos without really thinking...
story_14_02000/2401_1001_0900_10:
All right, the shoot is finished! Time for me to
transition from being a photographer to being
a Bug-type Pokémon Trainer!
story_14_02000/2401_1001_1000_10:
My lens is always focused on victory.
I won’t let anything ruin this shot!
story_14_02000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Hey...Viola? After the match is over,
can you do me a little favor?
story_14_02000/2401_1001_1300_10:
I was wondering if we could take a victory
photo with Beedrill and Surskit! Pleeease?
